title: Why i think we should disable chat
body: I have bipolar depression and I respond to toxicity very poorly and got suspended for "feeding" even though I was trying but I got really depressed from the constant bullying from my team and normally muting would solve it but once something is said I feel depressed and the damge is done if their was a way to not even have chat it would be a lot easier to not "tilt" and get to the erg to do something stupid and hurt my team.

replies.body:
Add me when you get back. Ill play with ya. Also, while getting dumped is hard to go through and a horrible reality, it is no reason to hurt your team.

If you start tilting just mute everybody and focus on playing the game.
I don't understand why there is a mute and curse filter if Riot is just gonna ban people anyway. Most people that get banned are people defending themselves from the other 4 on their team.

I'm sorry, but you already have the ability to mute everybody at the start of the game.
There's no reason to remove chat for everybody, merely because of your condition.
Asking for better wheelchair access is one thing, asking for all stairs to be removed is quite another.

Gather up a group of people to play with, and play with them. Doesn't even need to be 3,4, or 5. Just someone to have your back. Also, just remember that those people are literally babies who are crying cuz their diaper needs changing. I main support. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Hard to do when you only have 2 friends
